mission.title: Our mission
mission.p1: Swipe Movie was born from a simple observation: choosing a movie to watch as a group is often a source of endless debate. How many times have you spent 30 minutes looking for a movie, only to give up and watch the same series for the umpteenth time?
mission.p2: Our mission is to make this decision quick, democratic and fun. Thanks to our swipe system inspired by dating apps, each group member can express their preferences, and our algorithm automatically finds the movie that everyone will love.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Configure your preferences: movie genre, streaming platform, minimum rating, duration... Filters apply to all room members.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Share the room code with your friends, family or colleagues. No need for everyone to be connected at the same time!
howItWorks.step3Desc: Everyone swipes on their own. Right if the movie interests you, left otherwise. As soon as all members have liked the same movie: it's a match! üéâ

catalog.title: Movie catalog
catalog.description: We use The Movie Database (TMDb), which contains millions of movies and series. Information is updated regularly to offer you the latest releases and timeless classics.

free.title: Free and ad-free
free.description: Swipe Movie is 100% free and contains no ads. No credit card required, no hidden subscription. Our goal is to save you time, not money.

cta.title: Ready to simplify your movie nights?

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Have a question, suggestion or problem? We're here to help!

email.title: Email
email.description: For any general questions or support

github.title: GitHub
github.description: Report a bug or suggest an improvement

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, 100% free with no ads. No hidden fees, no subscription.
faq.q2: How do I invite friends to a room?
faq.a2: After creating a room, you'll receive a unique code. Share this code with your friends, and they can join the room from the homepage by clicking "Join a room".
faq.q3: Do we need to be online at the same time to swipe?
faq.a3: No! Each member can swipe at their own pace. As soon as all members have liked the same movie, you'll receive a match notification.
faq.q4: Where does the movie information come from?
faq.a4: We use The Movie Database (TMDb), a collaborative database with millions of movies and TV shows. Information is regularly updated.
faq.a5: Absolutely. We only collect strictly necessary information (name and email via Google OAuth). Check out our

cta.title: Didn't find your answer?
cta.description: Feel free to contact us by email, we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.p1: At Swipe Movie, we take your privacy seriously. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, why we collect it, and how we use it.
commitment.p2: Our fundamental principle: we only collect data strictly necessary for the application to function, and we never sell it to third parties.

account.title: 1. Account Information
account.intro: When you sign in with Google OAuth, we collect:
items: Your name
Your email address
Your Google profile picture (if available)

usage.title: 2. Usage Data
usage.intro: To make the application work, we store:
items: The rooms you create or join
Your swipes (like/dislike on movies)
The matches detected in your rooms

technical.title: 3. Technical Data
technical.intro: To improve user experience, we collect via Vercel Analytics:
items: Pages visited (anonymized)
Time spent on the application
Country of origin (for general statistics)

service.title: Provide the service:
service.description: your account data allows us to identify you, your swipes allow us to find matches with other members of your rooms.

improve.title: Improve the application:
improve.description: usage data helps us understand which features are used and which need improvement.

communication.title: Communication:
communication.description: we may send you email notifications about your account (matches, room invitations, etc.).

security.title: Data Security
security.intro: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data:
items: Secure connection via HTTPS
Authentication via Google OAuth 2.0
Database hosted on secure servers (Neon PostgreSQL)
Encrypted sessions and secure authentication tokens
No password storage (delegated to Google)

rights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of access:
access.description: you can request a copy of all your personal data

rectification.title: Right to rectification:
rectification.description: you can modify your account information

erasure.title: Right to erasure:
erasure.description: you can request complete deletion of your account and data

portability.title: Right to portability:
portability.description: you can retrieve your data in a usable format

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at

sharing.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
sharing.intro: We never sell your personal data. We only share certain data with:

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: We use cookies strictly necessary for the application to function:
items: Session cookie for authentication (required)
Theme preference cookie (dark/light mode)
cookies.noTracking: We do not use advertising or third-party tracking cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. The last update date is shown at the top of this page. In case of significant changes, we will inform you by email.

contactSection.title: Contact
contactSection.description: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, contact us at

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.p1: By using Swipe Movie, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.
acceptance.p2: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after publication on this page. Your continued use of the service after the publication of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.intro: Swipe Movie is a free web application that allows users to:
items: Create "rooms" to choose movies as a group
Invite other users to join their rooms
Swipe on movies to express their preferences
Discover "matches" when all room members like the same movie
description.outro: The service uses data from The Movie Database (TMDb) to provide movie information.

allowedUse.title: 3. Permitted Use
items: Use Swipe Movie for personal and non-commercial purposes
Create an account with your Google information
Create and join rooms
Swipe on movies and see your matches
Share your room codes with friends

prohibitedUse.title: 4. Prohibited Use
items: Use the service for commercial purposes without written authorization
Create fake accounts or impersonate others
Attempt to hack, compromise, or disrupt the service
Use bots, scripts, or automated tools
Extract or scrape data from the service
Post illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
Use the service to send spam or unsolicited content

accounts.title: 5. User Accounts
accounts.intro: To use Swipe Movie, you must create an account by signing in with Google OAuth. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the security of your Google account
All activities performed from your account
Immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use of your account
accounts.outro: We reserve the right to suspend or delete your account if we suspect a violation of these Terms.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.p1: Swipe Movie and all its contents (logo, design, code, etc.) are protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.p2: Movie information (posters, synopses, ratings, etc.) is provided by The Movie Database (TMDb) and is subject to their own terms of use.
intellectualProperty.p3: You retain all rights to the data you create in the application (your rooms, your swipes, etc.).

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: Swipe Movie is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We do not guarantee that:
items: The service will always be available or uninterrupted
Movie information is accurate or up to date
The service will be free from errors or bugs
liability.outro: Under no circumstances will Swipe Movie be liable for direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.p1: You may stop using the service and delete your account at any time by contacting us at
termination.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, without notice, if we believe you have violated these Terms.

law.title: 9. Applicable Law
law.description: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of these Terms will be submitted to the competent French courts.

contactSection.title: 10. Contact
contactSection.description: For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, contact us at

entireAgreement.title: 11. Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.descriptionEnd: constitute the entire agreement between you and Swipe Movie regarding the use of the service.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Start for free, upgrade when you need more features

q1.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
q1.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll keep access to premium features until the end of your billing period.

q2.question: What happens to my rooms if I downgrade?
q2.answer: Your existing rooms will remain accessible, but you won't be able to create new rooms that exceed your plan's limits. Older rooms may expire based on your new plan's retention period.

q3.question: Is my payment information secure?
q3.answer: Yes, we use Stripe for payment processing, which is PCI-DSS compliant and trusted by millions of businesses worldwide. We never store your credit card information on our servers.

rooms.title: Room Limit Reached
rooms.description: You've reached the maximum of {limit} rooms on the FREE plan. Upgrade to create unlimited rooms and enjoy more features!

participants.title: Participant Limit Reached
participants.description: You've reached the maximum of {limit} participants per room on the FREE plan. Upgrade for more participants!

swipes.title: Swipe Limit Reached
swipes.description: You've used all {limit} swipes in this room. Upgrade for unlimited swipes!

filters.title: Advanced Filters Locked
filters.description: Advanced filters are only available on PRO and TEAM plans. Upgrade to unlock powerful filtering options!
